name: IT 201 Sprint 04
description:
IT 201 Project - Sprint 04

This project is a clean-up of my version 03. In this sprint, I did not have any new features for the user. I did, however, organize and group the UI so it would be more appealing to the users and more intuitive. I added more buttons to randomize the object types and destroy time. All attributes will now work on existing objects and can be changed dynamically. Previously, the user had to make the change and only then the new spawned objects would inherit the update. I have defaulted the keyboard buttons 1-3 as animation effects and 4-6 as objects to spawn. The UI can also be hidden so that the user can have the entire screen to paint on.
